SELECT b.id id, b.title title, b.inserted inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply
FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_Id WHERE b.title LIKE #{search} GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT b.id id, b.title title, b.body body, b.inserted inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply
FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_Id WHERE b.id = #{id}
